short_summary: Supply of Dual Port Level 2 Networked EVSE
description: The National Research Council Canada (NRC) requires six (6) dual port Level 2 Networked Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment (EVSE) as well as ancillary items, data management services and extended warranty.
full_summary:
# **Tender Announcement: Dual Port Level 2 Networked EVSE**

**Reference Number: cb-818-91507369**

**Publication Date: April 17, 2024**

**Tender Closing Date: May 1, 2024, 2:00 PM ET**

The **National Research Council Canada (NRC)** invites suppliers to submit a request for proposal (RFP) for **Dual Port Level 2 Networked Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment (EVSE)**. This procurement is conducted under the framework of the **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**.

**Scope of Work:**
The NRC is seeking six (6) dual port Level 2 Networked EVSE, as well as ancillary items, data management services, and extended warranty. The selected supplier will be required to provide high-quality EVSE capable of Level 2 charging, as well as support and maintenance services.

**Key Specifications:**

* Electric vehicle charging systems (UNSpsc: 25175000)
* Systèmes de recharge pour véhicules électriques (UNSpsc: 25175000)
* Networked Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment (Level 2)
* Ancillary items, data management services, and extended warranty

**Tender Information:**

* Tender Status: Expired
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Procurement Method: Competitive, selective tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Supplier Information:**

* Suppliers interested in responding to this RFP should submit their proposal electronically.
* A detailed proposal package, including all necessary documents and information, is available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36181/rfp23-58264_npp_evse_16apr2024_0.pdf
* For any technical inquiries, please contact Tamara Stabb at tamara.stabb@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca.

**Important Dates:**
The tender closing date is **May 1, 2024, 2:00 PM ET**. The expected contract start date is **May 1, 2024**, and the expected contract end date is **April 30, 2025**.

Please ensure to review the RFP package and the contact information provided carefully before submitting your proposal. We appreciate your interest in this procurement opportunity.  You can reach out to Tamara Stabb with any questions at (587) 545-4859.  You can also email her at:
